Section.Catchline: Willfully or maliciously removing, destroying, damaging, or altering permitted signs; penalty.

SectionBody.Text: Any person who willfully or maliciously removes, damages, destroys, tampers with, or alters in any way a sign for which a permit has been issued under this chapter is guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083.
